title: Escaping Our Inevitable Collapse
alternative_title: Escaping Our Inevitable Collapse ; Hakyoku Furagu o Heshioritai ; 破局フラグをへし折りたい
status: Escaping Our Inevitable Collapse ; Hakyoku Furagu o Heshioritai ; 破局フラグをへし折りたい
description:
Description :
        The peak of happiness in love is... the moment you start dating?! Of course, everything would start to seem like a sign of a breakup!! Enter a scorching hot BL couple!! Yamoto and Seo have just embarked on their romantic journey. Initially drawn together by Seo's irresistible allure, Yamoto, who has a track record of breakups as swift as 10 days after dating, finds himself unable to fully embrace the romance, lamenting, "It only goes well until you start dating!" To complicate matters further, Seo seems hesitant to make any advances... Resigned to an inevitable end, Yamoto decides to take matters into his own hands and seduce Seo! But Seo harbors a secret... As the fear of losing something precious intensifies, will they overcome their insecurities and remain together?!
